description: Explore Elon Musk's transformative approach to open source licensing and its significant impact on innovation, technology, and society. This article discusses Musk's ventures and the potential for open source models to revolutionize industries facing global challenges.
keywords: Elon Musk, open source licensing, Tesla, SpaceX, Neuralink, The Boring Company, innovation, sustainable technology, collaboration, industry change
title: Elon Musk's Open Source Licensing Model: A Paradigm Shift in Innovation
